item.title: 30 Apr 2021 18:07
item.description:
Switched over to consuming Twitter via RSS feeds. For now I am using Yarns on WP to collect the feeds and the Indigenous app / Monocle-web social reader to read/interact with tweets. With this setup, I get to stay clear of the tracking and ads [Last … https://t.co/dMG22I9107
